title: #133: Authoritarians Love Pandemics | Liberty Lockdown
description:
Clint from Liberty Lockdown stops by to explain the ways in which tyrannical governments exploit situations in order to accumulate additional power while reducing the rights of the public.

What did we learn about ourselves after going through a suspension of laws and the forced shut down of society? Are we being conditioned to accept this behavior as normal? Is it possible to ever go back to the way things were back in 2019?

One thing is for certain, if the people give the government additional powers during emergencies, the government will create emergencies to justify retaining that power.
